level.heading: KENO PRIZE AND PRIZE STRUCTURE (ยง 30-926)

level.text: KENO prizes for each drawing shall be determined based on the Spots selected, the numbers matched and the amount(s) wagered, except that no prize in a 9 Spot Game or a 10 Spot Game shall exceed $100,000.
Set prizes based on a $1 wager shall be paid as set out in the prize structure at section 926.3. Overall odds of winning and prizes are determined for each Spot Game.
Except as provided in section 926.4, KENO is a set payout game which pays prizes based on a one dollar ($ 1) bet as follows:
Odds of winning in this game are 1:9.05
Odds of winning in this game are 1:4.61
Odds of winning in this game are 1:5.25
Odds of winning in this game are 1:5.46
Odds of winning in this game are 1:6.19
Odds of winning in this game are 1:10.34
Odds of winning in this game are 1:3.86
Odds of winning in this game are 1:6.55
Odds of winning in this game are 1:16.63
Odds of winning in this game are 1:4

The top prizes for the 8,9, and 10 Spot Games are each capped at a maximum top prize pool liability of $1,000,000 per drawing. The maximum top prize pool liability may reduce top prize payments in the 8,9, and 10 Spot Games under the following circumstances:

If the $1,000,000 maximum top prize pool liability for any 8, 9,or 10 Spot Game is exceeded, all top prizes for the 8,9, or 10 Spot Game winners will be paid the minimum top prize allowed for that Spot Game based on a $1 dollar wager;

If the payment of the minimum top prizes for the 8, 9, or 10 Spot Game is less than the $1,000,000 maximum top prize pool liability, the balance of the $1,000,000 maximum top prize pool liability will be paid to the 8,9, or 10 Spot Game top prize winners in proportion to the amount each winner wagered; and

If payment of the minimum top prizes for the 8, 9, or 10 Spot winners exceeds the $1,000,000 maximum top prize pool liability limit, the winnings will be distributed equally among the top prize 8,9, or 10 Spot Game top prize winners.
The Executive Director may adopt other prize structures that shall be effective upon the issuance of instructions to the public.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 50 DCR 1520 (February 14, 2003), 50 DCR 10135 (November 28, 2003) and 51 DCR 9993 (October 29, 2004).
